authenticated.suffix:
, you can try the default accounts:
- Administrator (login="admin" and password="admin")
- User (login="user" and password="user").

register.noaccount: You don't have an account yet?

error.dontmatch: The password and its confirmation do not match!

newpassword.minlength: Your password is required to be at least 4 characters.
newpassword.maxlength: Your password cannot be longer than 50 characters.

confirmpassword.minlength: Your confirmation password is required to be at least 4 characters.
confirmpassword.maxlength: Your confirmation password cannot be longer than 50 characters.

email.minlength: Your email is required to be at least 5 characters.
email.maxlength: Your email cannot be longer than 50 characters.

global.SessionExpired: Your session has expired! Please authenticate again.

validation.minlength: This field is required to be at least {{ min }} characters.
validation.maxlength: This field cannot be longer than {{ max }} characters.
validation.min: This field should be at least {{ min }}.
validation.max: This field cannot be more than {{ max }}.
validation.minbytes: This field should be at least {{ min }} bytes.
validation.maxbytes: This field cannot be more than {{ max }} bytes.
validation.pattern: This field should follow pattern for {{ pattern }}.
validation.number: This field should be a number.
validation.datetimelocal: This field should be a date and time.
validation.patternLogin: This field can only contain letters, digits and e-mail addresses.
validation.imageFileSize: The image must be less than 10MB in size.
validation.documentFileSize: The document must be less than 10MB in size.

error.Size: Field {{ fieldName }} does not meet min/max size requirements!
error.idexists: A new {{ entityName }} cannot already have an ID

file.not.image: File was expected to be an image but was found to be "{{ fileType }}"
